title: Application of section 270 to a creditorsâ€™ voluntary winding up
content: 281. The provisions of section 270 shall apply in the case of a creditors' voluntary winding up as in the case of a members' voluntary winding up, with the modification that powers of the liquidator under the said section shall not be exercised except with the sanction of the Court or of the committee of inspection. Duty of liquidator to call meetings of company and of creditors at end of each year.
